data: “We’ll take the little cable-tram, if you like, but it’s not far to walk—twenty minutes or so—the Trwyn’s seven hundred feet high.”
"We'll take the little cable-tram, if you like, but it's not far to walk--twenty minutes or so--the Trwyn's seven hundred feet high."
